name: The secret of N.I.M.H
description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.
reason: Engste film uit casper zijn jeugd, want een van de midjourney resultaten leek daarop: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/945077390839787570/1104056980655579177/larspars_thoughtful_anthro_rodent_looking_out_the_window_at_the_3dd552a3-4ad7-4528-a346-2376cbf3493e.png
